description: This file is a PHP source script for a web page that provides a user interface for adding port forwarding rules, including IP address inputs, validation logic, embedded JavaScript for interactive features, and server-side PHP code for dynamic content generation.

methods.name: populateIPv6Addr
methods.description: Converts an IPv6 address with '::' shorthand into a full address array with expanded zeros.

methods.name: IsBlank
methods.description: Checks if input fields with a given prefix are blank, excluding specific IPv6 address fields.

methods.name: GetAddress
methods.description: Concatenates values of input fields with a given prefix, separated by a specified separator.

methods.name: isIp6AddrRequired
methods.description: Determines if IPv6 address input fields are required based on whether they are blank.

methods.name: isIp4AddrRequired
methods.description: Determines if IPv4 address input fields are required based on whether they are blank.
